title: Shaft card
data:
{{obsolete}} {{flavour|The card depicts a traveler plummeting into a chasm that has opened beneath them. Drawing this card will create a shaft beneath the user, and possibly beneath their enemies.}} The '''Shaft card''' creates a [[shaft]] beneath the player or a monster. The player has to stand on a floor tile, because the card cannot create a shaft in [[water]] and beneath [[shop]]s, [[fountain]]s, or other [[dungeon features]]. The card has no effect on the final level of a branch, in single-floor branches, in the [[Abyss]], [[Hell]], [[Pandemonium]], or [[Ziggurat]]s; drawing it will only waste a turn. The chance to shaft a hostile monster depends on the card's power, equal to / 3.{{source ref|0.25.0|decks.cc|1039}} Note that the card can shaft all monsters in your [[line of sight]], even the [[invisible]] ones.
